subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: West Indies and South Africa were the best teams in the cricket year, the best individual story belonged to Marlon Samuels, and there was never a dull moment with Kevin Pietersen.
snippet: West Indies and South Africa were the best teams in the cricket year, the best individual story belonged to Marlon Samuels, and there was never a dull moment with Kevin Pietersen.
